Joining MIT Biology

After many weeks of interviewing, and many more weeks of filling out applications, I have decided to join the Department of Biology at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology beginning in Fall 2017. I look forward to writing much more about my graduate school and scientific experiences in the months and years ahead as I transition to life at MIT.
